snippet: “Being: Liverpool,” a six-part series about the British soccer club that starts Sunday afternoon, will be compared to HBO’s “Hard Knocks” and “24/7.”
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column on Fox Sports's six-part television series Being Liverpool about the British soccer club.
lead_paragraph: “Being: Liverpool,” a six-part series about the British soccer club that starts Sunday afternoon, will be compared to HBO’s “Hard Knocks” and “24/7.”

headline.seo: ‘Being: Liverpool’ Is an Inside Look, but Through the Club’s Lens
headline.main: An Inside Look, but Through the Club’s Lens
headline.print_headline: An Inside Look, but Through the Club’s Lens
